trans-unit.source: Please type the correct password directly into the text box below and click the button below.
The Password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

source.g: A Marketing Cloud admin wants to maximize login security to ensure that data is protected.
The Login Expires After Inactivity set to 90 days
Correct. Setting login expiration to 90 days is a best practice.
The Invalid Logins Before Lockout set to 3 attempts
Correct. Setting invalid logins before lockout to 3 attempts is a best practice.
The Session Timeout set to 8 hours
Incorrect. Setting Session Timeout to 20 minutes is a best practice.
The Minimum Username Length set to 6 characters
Incorrect. Usernames require at least 8 characters as a best practice.
1. Type or paste the questions in the questions section.
2. Type or paste the answers in the answer sections.
3. Type or paste the feedback for each answer.
4. In slide actions, click script_window and adjust the following:
= number of correct answers for this question
- ans1 = the letter of the correct answer
- ans2 = if there is a second correct answer, change to the applicable answer letter
- ans3 = if there is a third correct answer, change to the applicable answer letter
If you need an option E (a fifth answer)
2. Re-position all the items back into the fluid boxes (drag until box turns green).
3. From the last slide, copy and paste the three items to the appropriate emply fluid boxes.
4. Click each of the three items and ensure the labels (in Properties tab) are as follows:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to switch on the out-of-the-box audit trail functionality in the Marketing Cloud account, however they cannot see the option to enable it.
What could be the likely cause?
User is missing the Marketing Cloud Security Administrator rights.
Correct. Security Administrator rights give you permission to control Audit Trail functionality.
User is missing the Marketing Cloud Administrator rights.
Incorrect. Administrator rights do not give you permission to control Audit Trail functionality.
User is missing the Marketing Cloud Viewer rights.
Incorrect. Viewing rights give you the ability to view components in Marketing Cloud, but do not give you permission to control Audit Trail functionality.
User is missing the Marketing Cloud API user rights.
Incorrect. API user rights control the API access for a user, but do not give you permission to control Audit Trail functionality.
Northern Trail Outfitters plans to integrate their Sales Cloud Contacts.
How should their Marketing Cloud admin configure the Sync of the contact object so that only marketable contacts are synced over?
Select All records with an email address.
Correct. Selecting all records with an email address ensures only contacts that can be sent an email are synced.
Incorrect. Selecting all records will select all contacts within Sales Cloud, including contacts that don't have a valid email address.
Incorrect. All marketable records is not an option within the setup.
Incorrect. Selecting all new records will only sync newly created contacts and will not include any previous contacts with email addresses.
Which two metrics will a Marketing Cloud admin be able to view under Setup Home, given the apps are provisioned in the account?
A graph displaying the number and states of automations from the last 14 days
Incorrect. This graph shows the number and states of the automations from the last 7 days in your account.
The total number of emails sent from your account within the last 7 days
Incorrect. Email sends are not shown under Setup Home.
The total number of users in your account
Correct. The total number of users is shown under Setup Home.
The total number of content pieces in your account, including a subtotal of shared assets
Correct. The total number of content pieces in your account, including a subtotal of shared assets is shown under Setup Home.
What are the functionalities that you can work on within Setup Home? Pick two (2) options.
Correct. Create Data Extensions is available under Setup Home.
Correct. Manage FTP accounts is available under Setup Home.
Incorrect. This option is not available under Setup Home.
Incorrect. This option is not available under Setup Home.

As a Marketing Cloud Administrator you have been told about how heavy scripting in the email leads to severe delays in sending emails out the door. The Marketing department has asked you whether there is a possibility to speed things up. Which of the below functionality will be best suited for the need?
Correct. Burst Send allows pre build of emails so that send happens quicker.
Incorrect. This has no impact on send time.
Incorrect. This has no impact on send time.
Incorrect. While this is an option, its not the best choice because sometimes scripting is required.
